Name: Bicardar
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
7.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Spirit-forward with subtle notes of apricot, cherry, lemon and zesty citrus. Despite the inclusion of lemon juice, this cocktail is intended to be stirred (not shaken).
History: Created in 2008 by Kashi Forootani at the Seattle Hotel in Brighton, England. Originally based on Bacardi Carta Blanca rum , hence the name.
Nutrition: One serving of Bicardar contains 160 calories
